game.title: A Quest to Save the Kingdom
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact and return it to the castle
game.description: In order to complete your quest, you must journey through treacherous lands and meet with various NPCs. Your first task is to locate the hidden entrance to a secret cave.
game.reward: Rare treasure and a title of honor

task.objective: Head to the Forest of Shadows
task.description: Speak with the old tree guardian for directions to the cave.
task.location: The entrance is marked by a peculiar mushroom circle.
